question: This bank launches its fourth edition of Evolve recently.
explanation: Private sector Axis Bank launched the fourth edition of 'Evolve' in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu. It is an annual multi-city knowledge series for Bank's small and medium-sized enterprises (SME) customers. The current edition of 'evolve' is titled as "Transform your Family Business into your dream company". It will empower the SMEs to understand the winning strategies and best practices that have helped some of the leading family businesses in India grow into the reputable enterprise. This edition will span across 30 cities.
